price: 62 Les fidèles serviteurs d’Allah seront, en vérité, préservés de toute crainte et de toute affliction.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alā inna awliyāa al-lahi lā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
